contents.sentence:
Were transverse joints in accordance with the following:
(a) Transverse joints shall be constructed by exposing a near vertical full-depth face of the previous course.
(b) For areas inaccessible to rollers, other mechanical devices shall be used to achieve the required density.
(c) If constructed under traffic, temporary transverse joints shall be feathered to provide a smooth transition to the driving surface.
To ensure the structural integrity of the pavement, achieve designed density, and maintain ride quality and safety.
